Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Reroute at Harrison/Kilpatrick
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Cicero, Jackson, Kostner, and Harrison due to, street blockage near Harrison/Kilpatrick.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Harrison, Cicero, Jackson, Kostner, and Harrison due to, street blockage near Harrison/Kilpatrick.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Delayed at California
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at California due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at California due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
